data.actual_result: You see your user settings and can tap through to your profile, can attempt to message yourself and send yourself a friend request (both of which fail/give errors)
data.expected_result: It brings you to your account settings like everywhere else in the app
data.short_description: Able to see your own user settings & profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect to a server voice channel on another device, e.g. desktop - Try to connect to the same voice channel on your mobile device - "Connect to Voice" screen appears with list of people in channel, including yourself - Tap the 3-dot menu by your name
